channel.title: Not Enough Items 1.4.7
channel.description:
[img]http://www.6minecraft.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Not_Enough_Items.jpg[/img] NEI is a successor to both Too Many Items and Recipe Book. It arose around the same time as Craft Guide when Alexandria and a few others on the IRC suggested that I merge both Too Many Items and Recipe Book to remove their greatest flaws, ironically too many items, or in the case of recipe book, too many recipies. Too Many Items was great, but the one thing it lacked was an easy way to search and sort your items. When you had a mod like Red Power coming along with 10000 items both TMI and Recipe Book were racking up the pages. Even if you don't want to use NEI for cheating in items, you will likely feel right at home with the Recipe component of the mod.
[i]The process for installing NEI has changed. (For the easier AGAIN!).[/i]
Install FML 3.0.175.332+ OR MinecraftForge 4.0.0.240+ into the jar. Place the CodeChickenCore jar file into the coremods folder. Place the NEI jar file into the coremods folder. Place any modules' zip files in the mods folder.
[b]Compatible With[/b] Minecraft Forge. Convenient Inventory. (Install only ConvenientInventory.class) Mo Creatures.
[b]Download NEI 1.4.7[/b]: http://www.6minecraft.net/not-enough-items-mod/

item.title: Not Enough Items 1.4.7
item.dc:creator: @mineboyz mineboyz
item.description:
@mineboyz wrote:


NEI is a successor to both Too Many Items and Recipe Book. It arose around the same time as Craft Guide when Alexandria and a few others on the IRC suggested that I merge both Too Many Items and Recipe Book to remove their greatest flaws, ironically too many items, or in the case of recipe book, too many recipies. Too Many Items was great, but the one thing it lacked was an easy way to search and sort your items. When you had a mod like Red Power coming along with 10000 items both TMI and Recipe Book were racking up the pages. Even if you don’t want to use NEI for cheating in items, you will likely feel right at home with the Recipe component of the mod.

The process for installing NEI has changed. (For the easier AGAIN!).

Install FML 3.0.175.332+ OR MinecraftForge 4.0.0.240+ into the jar.
Place the CodeChickenCore jar file into the coremods folder.
Place the NEI jar file into the coremods folder.
Place any modules’ zip files in the mods folder.

Compatible With
Minecraft Forge.
Convenient Inventory. (Install only ConvenientInventory.class)
Mo Creatures.

Download NEI 1.4.7:

6Minecraft – 23 May 16

Not Enough Items Mod 1.13.1/1.13/1.12.2/1.11.2/1.10.2 - 6Minecraft

Not Enough Items Mod 1.12.2 is enhanced inventory management tool for Minecraft. Unlike Too Many Items, it has support for better Recipes.

Read full topic
